Introduction 
 Nowadays, more and more people are dedicating time to studying foreign languages as a second language. Many countries include at least one foreign language in their school curriculum and children are starting to learn a foreign language at a younger and younger age. Whether you are looking for a new job or planning to travel the world, studying a foreign language can help you progress in life both personally and professionally. You can compete in the global job market, increase your career skills and start to meet people around the world.
 It’s easy to see just how important English is around the world. Many international businesses conduct meetings in English, universities teach courses in English and, around the world, tourists and travellers use English as a common language. Furthermore, English is the most commonly spoken language in the world. One out of five people can speak or at least understand English! English is the language of science, aviation, computers, business, diplomacy, and tourism. Knowing English increases your chances of getting a good job in a multinational company within your home country or of finding work abroad. Moreover, English is a particularly important language online with more than half the content on the internet written in English. As well as this, some of the world’s largest tech companies are based in English speaking countries.
 The present English-Karakalpak and Karakalpak-English dictionary contains words and expressions reflecting new facts in the social and cultural life of latest years, and a considerable number of technical and other terms, found in everyday press, periodicals, radio, television and Internet. The dictionary does not only help to understand the text, or the speech in the foreign language, but is also the only reference program in the word-stock of the two languages. 
 The dictionary contains 4500 words and phrases, used most frequently. Almost all the words are given in short word groups or word combinations. This will serve to a better understanding of the word in question. Some words are illustrated, or explained, which helps learners to get updated information and to widen their outlook.
